title: ISIS Forged A Coalition To Seize Much Of Iraq, How Solid Is It?
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to counterterrorism expert David Kilcullen, a former adviser to the U.S. military in Iraq, and journalist Rania Abouzeid, who has tracked the rise of ISIS in Iraq and Syria.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
